FuncDef: The display value-added-service user command displays information about online users using the value-added service.
CLIs: display value-added-service user { service | without-service | edsg [ radius | diameter ] }
display value-added-service user { bod | daa [ service-policy <service-policy-name> ] [ inbound | outbound ] }

ParaDef.Info:
Indicates the user with the service.
-

Indicates the user without the service.
-

Indicates the enhanced dynamic service gateway.
-

Displays services delivered by the RADIUS server.
-

Displays services delivered by the Diameter channel.
-

Indicates the bandwidth on demand service type.
-

Indicates the destination address accounting service type.
-

Specifies the name of a DAA service policy.
The value is a string of 1 to 63  case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Examples: The ID table of used user with EDSG are:
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The display value-added-service user command is used to display the information about the VAS used by a user according to specified conditions.
Prerequisites
The specified user using value-added services is online.
